data.name: Warface - "Salamander" equipment
data.detailed_description:
About the "Salamander" set


The set includes 16 Salamander equipment objects: four pairs of gloves, shoes, as well as helmets and vests for four classes. The armor is well-balanced and can beat many other sets in terms of characteristics.

Items from the set are suitable for the classes "Rifleman", "Medic", "Engineer" and "Sniper".



Helmets from the "Salamander" series offer excellent protection against headshots and significantly reduce the effects of flash grenades.



The Vest gives extra armor points to each class, and allow to quickly switch between the selected weapon models.



The gloves provide reliable protection for the hands and accelerate reloading.



The boots, in addition to protecting legs, will give one additional bonus to each class:
- The "Rifleman" and "Sniper" will be able to move a little faster;
- The "Medic" will become almost silent;
- The "Engineer" will be less likely to explode on enemy claymore.



When equipped with a complete set, each of the four classes will receive additional unique bonuses: reducing recoil, health and armor regeneration, decreased damage, detection of enemy claymores, reduced shot scattering or increased ammunition.



But that's not all! When using individual models of weapons, the classes will also receive several very significant bonuses: a weighty decrease in incoming damage, reliable protection against explosions and an increase in mobility.



As you can see, armor can turn your fighter into a heavy and lively tank, but at the same time you will have to sacrifice mobility. However, by using certain guns from the list, you can compensate for this disadvantage.

After payment the items will appear on your in-game account. Wait 15 minutes or restart the game if necessary.
data.about_the_game:
About the "Salamander" set


The set includes 16 Salamander equipment objects: four pairs of gloves, shoes, as well as helmets and vests for four classes. The armor is well-balanced and can beat many other sets in terms of characteristics.

data.short_description: The "Salamander" set offers its owner excellent protection and helps to stay in the battle for a longer time. The set is especially relevant in Ranked and other PVP matches: it has high resilience and an ability to regenerate, the other characteristics are also well-balanced.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 415e
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 250 GTS / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 3470 / AMD Athlon 240GE
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
